titles.title: Make Marriage Great Again Act of 2023
Make Marriage Great Again Act of 2023
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the marriage penalty in the income tax rate brackets.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Make Marriage Great Again Act of 2023
This bill addresses the tax effect commonly known as the marriage penalty by modifying the tax brackets and income thresholds that married individuals use to calculate their tax liability.
